vulnerabilities.Details: Response from target URL (http://192.168.1.9:8088/ssrf.php?url=https%3A%2F%2Fexample.com, Status: 200) contained keyword 'Example Domain' when testing SSRF payload 'https://example.com'.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Whitelist allowed URLs, avoid user-controlled input in server-side requests, and implement SSRF protection libraries or firewalls.
